Title: I will Praise You

Verses.1:
I will praise You with all my heart. [*]
	I will sing Your praises before the gods.
Verses.2:
I will bow down towards Your holy temple, [t]
	and will praise Your Name [*]
	for Your mercy and Your truth.
For above all things, You have exalted [*]
	Your Name and Your word.
Verses.3:
On the day I called, You answered me; [*]
	You put great strength in my soul.
Verses.4:
All the kings of the earth, LORD, will praise you, [*]
	when they hear the words of Your mouth.
Verses.5:
And they will sing of the ways of the LORD, [*]
	for the glory of the LORD is great.
Verses.6:
For the LORD is exalted, [t]
	yet He looks after the lowly, [*]
	and the haughty He knows from afar.
Verses.7:
Though I walk amidst trouble, You preserve my life. [t]
	Your hand stretches out against the wrath of my enemies, [*]
	and You will save me with Your right hand.
Verses.8:
The LORD will fulfill His purposes for me. [t]
	LORD, your faithful love has no end, [*]
	do not abandon the works of Your hands.

Changes: 2023-10-15 - Paul Prins: First translation based on Greek, Latin, and some Hebrew.
